alert.note: Alert for Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 16 at 6:07AM CDT until May 18 at 7:51AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Current River near Powder Mill affecting Shannon County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Current River near Powder Mill. * WHEN...From this morning to Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 12.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:45 AM CDT Tuesday was 12.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 3.9 feet early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.4 feet on 04/23/2017. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
